entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending early this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
